org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

Class RunDatabaseDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils.JDOSupport<RunConnection>
      • org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker.RunDatabaseDAO

  • public class RunDatabaseDAO
extends JDOSupport<RunConnection>
    This handles storing runs, interfacing with the underlying state engine as necessary.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

public int countRuns()

      • get

        @Nullable
 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public TavernaRun get(String name)
        Obtain a workflow run handle.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of the run.
        Returns:
        The run handle, or null if there is no such run.

      • listRuns

        @Nonnull
 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public Map<String,TavernaRun> listRuns(UsernamePrincipal user,
                                                                                     Policy p)
        Get the runs that a user can read things from.
        Parameters:
        user - Who is asking?
        p - The policy that determines what they can see.
        Returns:
        A mapping from run IDs to run handles.

      • listRunNames

        @Nonnull
 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public List<String> listRunNames()
        Returns:
        A list of the IDs for all workflow runs.

      • pickArbitraryRun

        @Nullable
 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public RemoteRunDelegate pickArbitraryRun()
                                                                                  throws Exception
        Returns:
        An arbitrary, representative workflow run.
        Throws:
        Exception - If anything goes wrong.

      • persistRun

        @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public void persistRun(@Nonnull
                                                           RemoteRunDelegate rrd)
                                                    throws IOException
        Make a workflow run persistent. Must only be called once per workflow run.
        Parameters:
        rrd - The workflow run to persist.
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong with serialisation of the run.

      • unpersistRun

        @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public boolean unpersistRun(String name)
        Stop a workflow run from being persistent.
        Parameters:
        name - The ID of the run.
        Returns:
        Whether a deletion happened.

      • flushToDisk

        @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public void flushToDisk(@Nonnull
                                                            RemoteRunDelegate run)
                                                     throws IOException
        Ensure that the given workflow run is synchronized with the database.
        Parameters:
        run - The run to synchronise.
        Throws:
        IOException - If serialization of anything fails.

      • doClean

        @Nonnull
 @CallTimeLogger.PerfLogged
 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public List<String> doClean()
        Remove all workflow runs that have expired.
        Returns:
        The ids of the deleted runs.

      • getPotentiallyNotifiable

        @Nonnull
 @CallTimeLogger.PerfLogged
 @JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
public List<RemoteRunDelegate> getPotentiallyNotifiable()
        Returns:
        A list of workflow runs that are candidates for doing notification of termination.
